text: My kingdom is in every way improved beyond whatever it was before.

name: skel_arc_intro_13
text: Have you come to surrender? Very well then. <sigh> Prepare to die.

name: skel_arc_graves_empty_01
text: Look at all these plots. I've got work to do.
text_simple: look at all these plots ive got work to do

name: skel_arc_graves_empty_02
text: Never put off until tomorrow killing those you can find today.
text_simple: never put off until tomorrow killing those you can find today

name: skel_arc_graves_empty_03
text: Trust me. These graves'll be filled in no time.
text_simple: trust me these gravesll be filled in no time

text: I better not hear of any doubts. OR YOU'LL BE THE FIRST BODY BURIED HERE.

name: skel_arc_graveyard_01
text: Look upon my collection and rejoice!
text_simple: look upon my collection and rejoice

text: My schemes are all about plots. Plots as far as the eye can see.

text: Long life has made me something of a completionist.

text: Who else should have such a fine collection?

name: skel_arc_taunt_03
text: Believe it or not, there IS a painless way to remove your all your bones. It just involves killing you first. And what fun would that be?

text: You can remove yourself now. I mistook those abnormal growths for interesting bone structure.
